argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dedth2h.1 | |- ( A = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) |
| 2 |  | dedth2h.2 | |- ( B = if ( ps , B , D ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) |
| 3 |  | dedth2h.3 | |- ta |
| 4 | 1 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( A = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ( ps -> ch ) <-> ( ps -> th ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_dedth | |- ( ps -> th ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_dedth | |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) |
